授業目的:
In this course students will study the
interconnectedness of global environmental issues and sustainable development.
到達目標:
Students completing this course will be able to:

-Acquire basic knowledge on global environmental issues and the policies
of addressing sustainable use of natural resources

-Understand how environmental policies aim to
balance ecological, economic, and social factors, with a focus on
sustainability 

-Expand knowledges of how science interconnects
with environmental policy analysis and decision making

-Enhance critical thinking, reading, discussing,
presenting, and writing skills
